item.title: How can I do this?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox"))
{
if(teleblock){
sendMessage("A mysterious force prevents you from teleing, ohhhhh shit");
}else{
teleportToX = 3109;
teleportToY = 3781;
alertPlayer ("Welcome to awesomepk pkbox :D");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has teled to pkbox";
	   
}
}

item.title: How can I do this?
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

Well i want to make ::Pkbox tele you there if you are not teleblocked.
Like if you try to go through a portal while teleblocked it wont let you. this is what my code looks like for pkbox.

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”))
{
teleportToX = 3109;
teleportToY = 3781;
alertPlayer (“Welcome to awesomepk pkbox :D”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has teled to pkbox";

}[/code]
